title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Special Topics in Entrepreneurship (EP 60025) Facts about the New venture creations with limited resources, Psychology of Entrepreneurship, Acquiring Resources, Opportunity Recognition, Creativity and Improvisation or other evolving topics
